response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us and is worth $1,000,000 to you, based on your needs and expectations. Our aim is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction.

We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a significant saving while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment in the product.

Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We are confident that our product will meet and exceed your expectations, and we look forward to potentially working together.

Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
